Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Arazni]{Arazni}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Calistria]{Calistria}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Doloras]{Doloras}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Gyronna]{Gyronna}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Narakaas]{Narakaas}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shax]{Shax}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sifkesh]{Sifkesh}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones]{Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Vildeis]{Vildeis}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Yaezhing]{Yaezhing}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zon-Kuthon]{Zon-Kuthon}
Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Savor the Sting]{Savor the Sting}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Retributive Pain]{Retributive Pain}
You punish those who displease you with the sharp sting of pain.
name: Pain Domain
